data.name: rfema
data.description: rfema allows users to access The Federal Emergency Management Agency's (FEMA)  publicly available data through their API. The package provides a set of functions to easily navigate and access data  from the National Flood Insurance Program along and FEMA's various disaster aid programs.

evidence: “`rfema` allows users to access The Federal Emergency Management Agency’s (FEMA) publicly available data through the open FEMA API. The package provides a set of functions to easily navigate and access all data sets provided by FEMA” (R package used directly by researchers).
“Right now, the best way to install and use the `rfema` package is by installing directly from rOpenSci using `install.packages("rfema", repos = "https://ropensci.r-universe.dev")`.”
